DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate if nutritional treatment with nutritional supplementation of dietary fiber reduces cholesterol levels and triglycerides (dyslipidemia) in patients with HIV/AIDS receiving antiretroviral therapy (HAART).
DOC.brief_title: Treatment With Nutritional Eating Plan and Dietary Fibers in Adult Patients With HIV/AIDS
DOC.criteria: HIVinfected patients Adults (â‰¥ 19 years old) On highly active antiretroviral therapy (HAART) Pregnancy Breastfeeding Opportunistic disease
